headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Record A Studios is offering 30% off all the merchandise and clothing sold at the studio’s gift shop. You can visit Record A Studios after completing Dr. Dre’s VIP Contract to access this exclusive collection.

Hangars and all their Upgrades are 40% off. Plus, there’s a range of vehicles on sale too, including:

- Bravado Buffalo STX - 25% off
- Declasse Tulip - 30% off
- Buckingham Alpha-Z1 - 40% off
- Jobuilt Velum 5-Seater - 30% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for details.
